Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

enable boolean required

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

Configure firewall for an Edge

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

Read the firewall configuration

Security

  • basic

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

Configure firewall for an Edge

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewall">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="defaultPolicy">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element name="globalConfig">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpPickOngoingConnections"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dropInvalidTraffic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logInvalidTraffic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutOpen"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutEstablished"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutClose"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="udpTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmpTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmp6Timeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipGenericTimeout"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="rules">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="rule">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element name="source">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="destination">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:choice>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="application">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationId"/>
                          <xs:element name="service">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sourcePort"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="matchTranslated"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<firewall>
  <defaultPolicy>
    <action></action>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
  </defaultPolicy>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <globalConfig>
    <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections>
    <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets>
    <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts>
    <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic>
    <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic>
    <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen>
    <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished>
    <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose>
    <udpTimeout></udpTimeout>
    <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout>
    <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout>
    <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout>
  </globalConfig>
  <rules>
    <rule>
      <ruleTag></ruleTag>
      <name></name>
      <source>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </source>
      <destination>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </destination>
      <application>
        <applicationId></applicationId>
        <service>
          <protocol></protocol>
          <port></port>
          <sourcePort></sourcePort>
        </service>
      </application>
      <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
      <direction></direction>
      <action></action>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
      <description></description>
    </rule>
  </rules>
</firewall>

DELETE /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

Delete firewall configuration

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/defaultpolicy

Default firewall policy for an Edge

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/defaultpolicy

Retrieve default firewall policy

Security

  • basic

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/defaultpolicy

Configure default firewall policy

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewallDefaultPolicy">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<firewallDefaultPolicy>
  <action></action>
  <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
</firewallDefaultPolicy>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/global

NSX Edge global firewall configuration

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/global

Retrieve the firewall default policy for an Edge

Security

  • basic

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/global

Configure firewall global config for an Edge

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="globalConfig">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpPickOngoingConnections"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dropInvalidTraffic"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logInvalidTraffic"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutOpen"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutEstablished"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutClose"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="udpTimeout"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmpTimeout"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmp6Timeout"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipGenericTimeout"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<globalConfig> <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections> <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets> <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts> <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic> <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic> <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen> <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished> <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose> <udpTimeout></udpTimeout> <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout> <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout> <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout> </globalConfig>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules

Firewall rules

POST /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules

Add one or more rules. You can add a rule above a specific rule using the query parameter, indicating the desired ruleID.

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

aboveRuleId string

rule Id

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewall">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="defaultPolicy">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="globalConfig">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpPickOngoingConnections"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dropInvalidTraffic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logInvalidTraffic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutOpen"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutEstablished"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutClose"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="udpTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmpTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmp6Timeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipGenericTimeout"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="rules">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="rule">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element name="source">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="destination">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:choice>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="application">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationId"/>
                          <xs:element name="service">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sourcePort"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="matchTranslated"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<firewall>
  <defaultPolicy>
    <action></action>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
  </defaultPolicy>
  <globalConfig>
    <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections>
    <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets>
    <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts>
    <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic>
    <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic>
    <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen>
    <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished>
    <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose>
    <udpTimeout></udpTimeout>
    <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout>
    <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout>
    <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout>
  </globalConfig>
  <rules>
    <rule>
      <ruleTag></ruleTag>
      <name></name>
      <source>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </source>
      <destination>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </destination>
      <application>
        <applicationId></applicationId>
        <service>
          <protocol></protocol>
          <port></port>
          <sourcePort></sourcePort>
        </service>
      </application>
      <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
      <direction></direction>
      <action></action>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
      <description></description>
    </rule>
  </rules>
</firewall>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

Specific firewall rule

URI Parameters

ruleId string required

Rule ID

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

Retrieve specific rule

Security

  • basic

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

Modify a specific firewall rule

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="rule">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element name="source">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="destination">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="application">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="matchTranslated"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<rule>
  <ruleTag></ruleTag>
  <name></name>
  <source>
    <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
    <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
  </source>
  <destination>
    <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
    <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
  </destination>
  <application>
    <applicationId></applicationId>
  </application>
  <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
  <direction></direction>
  <action></action>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
  <description></description>
</rule>

Security

  • basic

  • basic

Query Parameters

interval string

60 min by default, can be given as 1 -60 min, oneDay | oneWeek | oneMonth | oneYear

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/highavailability/config

Ensures that an Edge appliance is always available on your virtualized network.

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/highavailability/config

Get high availability configuration

Security

  • basic

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/highavailability/config

Configure high availability

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="highAvailability">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
        <xs:element name="ipAddresses">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="declareDeadTime"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<highAvailability>
  <vnic></vnic>
  <ipAddresses>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  </ipAddresses>
  <declareDeadTime></declareDeadTime>
  <enabled></enabled>
</highAvailability>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces

Working with all NSX Edge router interfaces

POST /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces

Add interfaces for NSX Edge router. Can have up to 8 uplink interfaces

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

action string required

Always set to 'patch'

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="interfaces">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="interface">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element name="addressGroups">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="addressGroup">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryAddress"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnetMask"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isConnected"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectedToId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<interfaces>
  <interface>
    <name></name>
    <addressGroups>
      <addressGroup>
        <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
        <subnetMask></subnetMask>
      </addressGroup>
    </addressGroups>
    <mtu></mtu>
    <type></type>
    <isConnected></isConnected>
    <connectedToId></connectedToId>
  </interface>
</interfaces>

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces

Retrieve all interfaces for Edge router

Security

  • basic

DELETE /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces

Delete interfaces

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

index string

Specify index of interface to delete (e.g. ?index=&index=). If no indices specified, all interfaces are deleted

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces/{index}

Manage a specific NSX Edge router interface

URI Parameters

Specified router interface

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/ipsec/config

Working with IPSEC VPN

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/ipsec/config

Retrieve IPSec configuration

Security

  • basic

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/ipsec/config

Configure IPSEC VPN

Security

  • basic

Request Example (application/xml)

<ipsec>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <logLevel></logLevel>
  <enable></enable>
  <global>
    <psk></psk>
    <serviceCertificate></serviceCertificate>
    <caCertificates>
      <caCertificate></caCertificate>
    </caCertificates>
    <crlCertificates>
      <crlCertificate></crlCertificate>
    </crlCertificates>
  </global>
  <sites>
    <site>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <name></name>
      <description></description>
      <localId></localId>
      <localIp></localIp>
      <peerId></peerId>
      <peerIp></peerIp>
      <encryptionAlgorithm></encryptionAlgorithm>
      <authenticationMode>psk</authenticationMode>
      <psk></psk>
      <enablePfs></enablePfs>
      <dhGroup></dhGroup>
      <localSubnets>
        <subnet></subnet>
      </localSubnets>
      <peerSubnets>
        <subnet></subnet>
      </peerSubnets>
    </site>
  </sites>
</ipsec>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/ipsec/statistics

IPSec statistics

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/ipsec/statistics

Retrieve IPSec statistics

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

L2 VPN allows you to configure a tunnel between two sites. VM's remain on the same subnet in spite of being moved between these sites, enabling you to extend your datacenter. An NSX Edge at one site can provide all services to VM's on the other site.

POST /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

Enable or disable L2 VPN service according to the value of the query parameter "enableService"

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

enableService boolean required

Enable or disable L2 VPN

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

Retrieve the current L2VPN configuration for NSX Edge

Security

  • basic

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

Configure L2VPN for server or client

Security

  • basic

Request Example (application/xml)

<l2Vpn>
  <enabled>true</enabled>
  <logging>
    <enable>false</enable>
    <logLevel>info</logLevel>
    </logging>
    <l2VpnSites>
    <l2VpnSite>
      <server>
        <configuration>
          <listenerIp></listenerIp>
          <listenerPort></listenerPort>
          <encryptionAlgorithm></encryptionAlgorithm>
          <serverCertificate></serverCertificate>
          <peerSites>
            <peerSite>
              <name></name>
              <description></description>
              <l2VpnUser>
                <userId></userId>
                <password></password>
              </l2VpnUser>
              <vnics>
                <index></index>
              </vnics>
              <egressOptimization>
                <gatewayIpAddress></gatewayIpAddress>
              </egressOptimization>
              <enabled></enabled>
            </peerSite>
          </peerSites>
        </configuration>
      </server>
    </l2VpnSite>
  </l2VpnSites>
</l2Vpn>

DELETE /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

Delete L2 VPN

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config/statistics

L2 VPN statistics

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config/statistics

Retrieve L2 VPN stats, which has information such as tunnel status, sent bytes, received bytes etc. for the given Edge

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/acceleration

Update acceleration mode

POST /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/acceleration

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

enable boolean required

Enable or disable load balancer acceleration mode

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config

NSX Edge load balancer

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config

Get current load balancer config

Security

  • basic

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config

Configure load balancer

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="loadBalancer">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableServiceInsertion"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="accelerationEnabled"/>
        <xs:element name="logging">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="virtualServer">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="virtualServerId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectionLimit"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectionRateLimit"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationProfileId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultPoolId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableServiceInsertion"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="accelerationEnabled"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="applicationProfile">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationProfileId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="insertXForwardedFor"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sslPassthrough"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="template"/>
              <xs:element name="persistence">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieName"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieMode"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="serverSslEnabled"/>
              <xs:element name="clientSsl"/>
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="clientAuth"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="serviceCertificate"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="pool">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="poolId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="transparent"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="algorithm"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorId"/>
              <xs:element name="member">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="memberId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorPort"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minConn"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxConn"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="monitor">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="interval"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxRetries"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="url"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="applicationRule">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="script"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<loadBalancer>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
  <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
  <logging>
    <enable></enable>
    <logLevel></logLevel>
  </logging>
  <virtualServer>
    <virtualServerId></virtualServerId>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    <protocol></protocol>
    <port></port>
    <connectionLimit></connectionLimit>
    <connectionRateLimit></connectionRateLimit>
    <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
    <defaultPoolId></defaultPoolId>
    <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
    <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
    <applicationRuleId></applicationRuleId>
  </virtualServer>
  <applicationProfile>
    <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
    <name></name>
    <insertXForwardedFor></insertXForwardedFor>
    <sslPassthrough></sslPassthrough>
    <template></template>
    <persistence>
      <method></method>
      <cookieName></cookieName>
      <cookieMode></cookieMode>
    </persistence>
    <serverSslEnabled></serverSslEnabled>
    <clientSsl>
      <clientAuth></clientAuth>
      <serviceCertificate></serviceCertificate>
    </clientSsl>
  </applicationProfile>
  <pool>
    <poolId></poolId>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <transparent></transparent>
    <algorithm></algorithm>
    <monitorId></monitorId>
    <member>
      <memberId></memberId>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      <weight></weight>
      <port></port>
      <monitorPort></monitorPort>
      <minConn></minConn>
      <maxConn></maxConn>
      <name></name>
    </member>
  </pool>
  <monitor>
    <monitorId></monitorId>
    <type></type>
    <interval></interval>
    <timeout></timeout>
    <maxRetries></maxRetries>
    <method></method>
    <url></url>
    <name></name>
  </monitor>
  <applicationRule>
    <name></name>
    <script></script>
  </applicationRule>
</loadBalancer>

DELETE /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config

Delete load balancer configuration

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/applicationprofiles

Application profiles define the behavior of a particular type of network traffic

POST /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/applicationprofiles

Add an application profile

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="applicationProfile">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="insertXForwardedFor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sslPassthrough"/>
        <xs:element name="persistence">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieName"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieMode"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<applicationProfile>
  <name></name>
  <insertXForwardedFor></insertXForwardedFor>
  <sslPassthrough></sslPassthrough>
  <persistence>
    <method></method>
    <cookieName></cookieName>
    <cookieMode></cookieMode>
  </persistence>
</applicationProfile>

              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>

  • basic

Request Schema

  <xs:element name="monitor">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="interval"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeout"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxRetries"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="url"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/pools

Server pools manage load balancer distribution methods and has a monitor attached to it for health check parameters

POST /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/pools

Add a load balancer server pool to the Edge

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="pool">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="transparent"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="algorithm"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorId"/>
        <xs:element name="member">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minConn"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxConn"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorPort"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<pool>
  <name></name>
  <description></description>
  <transparent></transparent>
  <algorithm></algorithm>
  <monitorId></monitorId>
  <member>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    <weight></weight>
    <port></port>
    <minConn></minConn>
    <maxConn></maxConn>
    <name></name>
    <monitorPort></monitorPort>
  </member>
</pool>

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/virtualservers

Working with virtual servers.

POST /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/virtualservers

Add a virtual server.

You can add an NSX Edge internal or uplink interface as a virtual server.

Name Required Comments
name yes
description no
enabled no default is true
ipAddress yes
protocol yes Possible values are HTTP, HTTPS, TCP, or UDP.
port yes A single port, a comma separate list, a range, or a combination. For example, 443,6000-7000.
connectionLimit no Maximum concurrent connections
connectionRateLimit no Maximum incoming new connection requests per second
defaultPoolId no The default backend server pool identifier
applicationProfileId no The application profile identifier
accelerationEnabled no Use the faster L4 load balancer engine rather than L7 load balancer engine.
Note: If a virtual server configuration such as application rules, HTTP type, or cookie persistence, is using the L7 load balancer engine, then the L7 load balancer engine is used, even if accelerationEnabled is not set to true.
applicationRuleId no The application rule identifier list

Security

  • basic

Responses

200 OK

OK

Response Example (application/xml) 
<virtualServer>
  <name>http_vip_2</name>
  <description>http virtualServer 2</description>
  <enabled>true</enabled>
  <ipAddress>10.117.35.172</ipAddress>
  <protocol>http</protocol>
  <port>443,6000-7000</port>
  <connectionLimit>123</connectionLimit>
  <connectionRateLimit>123</connectionRateLimit>
  <applicationProfileId>applicationProfile-1</applicationProfileId>
  <defaultPoolId>pool-1</defaultPoolId>
  <enableServiceInsertion>false</enableServiceInsertion>
  <accelerationEnabled>true</accelerationEnabled>
</virtualServer>

400 Bad Request

Bad request. Request object passed is invalid.

403 Forbidden

Forbidden. Authorization header not provided.

404 Not Found

Not found. Requested object not found.

505 HTTP Version Not Supported

Internal server error. Input contained no data.

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/virtualservers

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/mgmtinterface

Working with management interfaces for an NSX Edge router

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/mgmtinterface

Retrieve all managedment interfaces to the NSX Edge router

Security

  • basic

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/mgmtinterface

Configure management interfaces for NSX Edge router

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="mgmtInterface">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="addressGroups">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="addressGroup">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnetMask"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectedToId"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<mgmtInterface>
  <addressGroups>
    <addressGroup>
      <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
      <subnetMask></subnetMask>
    </addressGroup>
  </addressGroups>
  <mtu></mtu>
  <connectedToId></connectedToId>
</mgmtInterface>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config

SNAT and DNAT rules for NSX Edge

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config

Configure SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="nat">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="natRules">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="natRule">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedPort"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalPort"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<nat>
  <natRules>
    <natRule>
      <ruleTag></ruleTag>
      <action></action>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <originalAddress></originalAddress>
      <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
      <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <description></description>
      <protocol></protocol>
      <translatedPort></translatedPort>
      <originalPort></originalPort>
    </natRule>
  </natRules>
</nat>

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules

NAT rules

POST /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules

Add a NAT rule above a specific rule in the NAT rules table (using aboveRuleId) or append NAT rules to the bottom

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

aboveRuleId string

Specified rule ID. If the ID does not exist, Edge Manager displays an error

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="natRules">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="natRule">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedPort"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalPort"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<natRules>
  <natRule>
    <action></action>
    <vnic></vnic>
    <originalAddress></originalAddress>
    <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <description></description>
    <protocol></protocol>
    <translatedPort></translatedPort>
    <originalPort></originalPort>
  </natRule>
</natRules>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

Security

  • basic

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

Configure globalConfig, staticRouting, OSPG, BGP, and IS-IS

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="routing">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="routingGlobalConfig">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ecmp"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="routerId"/>
              <xs:element name="logging">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ipPrefixes">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="ipPrefix">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="staticRouting">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="staticRoutes">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="route">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="nextHop"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="defaultRoute">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gatewayAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="ospf">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultOriginate"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gracefulRestart"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocolAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="forwardingAddress"/>
              <xs:element name="ospfAreas">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="ospfArea">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element name="authentication">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ospfInterfaces">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="ospfInterface">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloInterval"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="deadInterval"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="priority"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cost"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="redistribution">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element name="rules">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                                <xs:element name="from">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="isis">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="systemId"/>
              <xs:element name="areaIds">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isType"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainPassword"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaPassword"/>
              <xs:element name="isisInterfaces">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="isisInterface">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="meshGroup"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloInterval"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloMultiplier"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lspInterval"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="metric"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="priority"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="circuitType"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="redistribution">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element name="rules">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                                <xs:element name="from">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="bgp">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="localAS"/>
              <xs:element name="bgpNeighbours">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="bgpNeighbour">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="remoteAS"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="holdDownTimer"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="keepAliveTimer"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
                          <xs:element name="bgpFilters">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element name="bgpFilter">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipPrefixGe"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipPrefixLe"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="redistribution">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element name="rules">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                                <xs:element name="from">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<routing>
  <routingGlobalConfig>
    <ecmp></ecmp>
    <routerId></routerId>
    <logging>
      <enable></enable>
      <logLevel></logLevel>
    </logging>
    <ipPrefixes>
      <ipPrefix>
        <name></name>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </ipPrefix>
    </ipPrefixes>
  </routingGlobalConfig>
  <staticRouting>
    <staticRoutes>
      <route>
        <description></description>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <network></network>
        <nextHop></nextHop>
        <mtu></mtu>
      </route>
    </staticRoutes>
    <defaultRoute>
      <description></description>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <gatewayAddress></gatewayAddress>
      <mtu></mtu>
    </defaultRoute>
  </staticRouting>
  <ospf>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <defaultOriginate></defaultOriginate>
    <gracefulRestart></gracefulRestart>
    <protocolAddress></protocolAddress>
    <forwardingAddress></forwardingAddress>
    <ospfAreas>
      <ospfArea>
        <areaId></areaId>
        <type></type>
        <authentication>
          <type></type>
          <value></value>
        </authentication>
      </ospfArea>
    </ospfAreas>
    <ospfInterfaces>
      <ospfInterface>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <areaId></areaId>
        <helloInterval></helloInterval>
        <deadInterval></deadInterval>
        <priority></priority>
        <cost></cost>
      </ospfInterface>
    </ospfInterfaces>
    <redistribution>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <prefixName></prefixName>
          <from>
            <isis></isis>
            <ospf></ospf>
            <bgp></bgp>
            <static></static>
            <connected></connected>
          </from>
          <action></action>
        </rule>
      </rules>
    </redistribution>
  </ospf>
  <isis>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <systemId></systemId>
    <areaIds>
      <areaId></areaId>
    </areaIds>
    <isType></isType>
    <domainPassword></domainPassword>
    <areaPassword></areaPassword>
    <isisInterfaces>
      <isisInterface>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <meshGroup></meshGroup>
        <helloInterval></helloInterval>
        <helloMultiplier></helloMultiplier>
        <lspInterval></lspInterval>
        <metric></metric>
        <priority></priority>
        <circuitType></circuitType>
        <password></password>
      </isisInterface>
    </isisInterfaces>
    <redistribution>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <prefixName></prefixName>
          <from>
            <isis></isis>
            <ospf></ospf>
            <bgp></bgp>
            <static></static>
            <connected></connected>
          </from>
          <action></action>
        </rule>
      </rules>
    </redistribution>
  </isis>
  <bgp>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <localAS></localAS>
    <bgpNeighbours>
      <bgpNeighbour>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        <remoteAS></remoteAS>
        <weight></weight>
        <holdDownTimer></holdDownTimer>
        <keepAliveTimer></keepAliveTimer>
        <password></password>
        <bgpFilters>
          <bgpFilter>
            <direction></direction>
            <action></action>
            <network></network>
            <ipPrefixGe></ipPrefixGe>
            <ipPrefixLe></ipPrefixLe>
          </bgpFilter>
        </bgpFilters>
      </bgpNeighbour>
    </bgpNeighbours>
    <redistribution>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <prefixName></prefixName>
          <from>
            <isis></isis>
            <ospf></ospf>
            <bgp></bgp>
            <static></static>
            <connected></connected>
          </from>
          <action></action>
        </rule>
      </rules>
    </redistribution>
  </bgp>
</routing>

DELETE /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

Delete the routing config stored in the NSX Mgr database and the default routes from the specified NSX Edge appliance

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/bgp

Manage BGP routes for NSX Edge

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/bgp

Query BGP

Security

  • basic

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/bgp

Configure BGP

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="bgp">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="localAS"/>
        <xs:element name="bgpNeighbours">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="bgpNeighbour">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="remoteAS"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="holdDownTimer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="keepAliveTimer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
                    <xs:element name="bgpFilters">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="bgpFilter">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipPrefixGe"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipPrefixLe"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="redistribution">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element name="rules">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="rule">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                          <xs:element name="from">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<bgp>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <localAS></localAS>
  <bgpNeighbours>
    <bgpNeighbour>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      <remoteAS></remoteAS>
      <weight></weight>
      <holdDownTimer></holdDownTimer>
      <keepAliveTimer></keepAliveTimer>
      <password></password>
      <bgpFilters>
        <bgpFilter>
          <direction></direction>
          <action></action>
          <network></network>
          <ipPrefixGe></ipPrefixGe>
          <ipPrefixLe></ipPrefixLe>
        </bgpFilter>
      </bgpFilters>
    </bgpNeighbour>
  </bgpNeighbours>
  <redistribution>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <rules>
      <rule>
        <prefixName></prefixName>
        <from>
          <isis></isis>
          <ospf></ospf>
          <bgp></bgp>
          <static></static>
          <connected></connected>
        </from>
        <action></action>
      </rule>
    </rules>
  </redistribution>
</bgp>

DELETE /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/bgp

Delete BGP Routing

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/global

Global configuration

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/global

Configure global route

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="routingGlobalConfig">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="routerId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ecmp"/>
        <xs:element name="logging">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="ipPrefixes">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="ipPrefix">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<routingGlobalConfig>
  <routerId></routerId>
  <ecmp></ecmp>
  <logging>
    <enable></enable>
    <logLevel></logLevel>
  </logging>
  <ipPrefixes>
    <ipPrefix>
      <name></name>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </ipPrefix>
  </ipPrefixes>
</routingGlobalConfig>

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/global

Retrieve routing info from NSX Mgr database (default route settings, static route configurations)

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/isis

IS-IS Routes for NSX Edge

GET /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/isis

Query ISIS

Security

  • basic

PUT /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/isis

Config ISIS

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="isis">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="systemId"/>
        <xs:element name="areaIds">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isType"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainPassword"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaPassword"/>
        <xs:element name="isisInterfaces">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="isisInterface">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="meshGroup"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloInterval"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloMultiplier"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lspInterval"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="metric"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="priority"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="circuitType"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="redistribution">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element name="rules">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="rule">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                          <xs:element name="from">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<isis>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <systemId></systemId>
  <areaIds>
    <areaId></areaId>
  </areaIds>
  <isType></isType>
  <domainPassword></domainPassword>
  <areaPassword></areaPassword>
  <isisInterfaces>
    <isisInterface>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <meshGroup></meshGroup>
      <helloInterval></helloInterval>
      <helloMultiplier></helloMultiplier>
      <lspInterval></lspInterval>
      <metric></metric>
      <priority></priority>
      <circuitType></circuitType>
      <password></password>
    </isisInterface>
  </isisInterfaces>
  <redistribution>
    <enabled></enabled>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <prefixName></prefixName>
            <from>
              <isis></isis>
              <ospf></ospf>
              <bgp></bgp>
              <static></static>
              <connected></connected>
            </from>
            <action></action>
          </rule>
      </rules>
  </redistribution>
</isis>
